description.S1: Lilya Hagen has a lead on some expensive salvage.
description.S3: several factories and research facilities were left mostly intact.
description.S4: While the majority of those locations have previously been stripped of valuable resources,
description.S5: SubLight agents on Monarch recently discovered a hidden laboratory with a cache of Alta-Vitae gas.
description.S6: Lilya needs an independent captain to retrieve the salvage.

blurb.B1: This quest is obtained by taking the job with Lilya Hagen aboard the Groundbreaker after you've gained access to Stellar Bay on Monarch.

description.S1: Lilya hasn't heard from her agent in Stellar Bay recently.
description.S2: Retrieve the information he's holding on the salvage location and deliver it to Catherine Malin in Fallbrook.

blurb.B1: Head outside to the fishery docks in Stellar Bay of Monarch and loot the corpse there in the corner.
blurb.B2: This will provide you with a Bloody Note that has a passcode on it.
blurb.B3: Take the note to Catherine Malin in Fallbrook.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: So you're the new captain in town. I was hoping you'd make your way to my office. Saves me the work of hunting you down.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Lilya Hagen, CEO and Executive Director of Aggressive Operations. I'm guessing you already know about SubLight, otherwise you wouldn't have come.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Name's <oeitoken>PlayerName</oeitoken>, Captain of the Unreliable.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm Captain Hawthorne, the proud owner of the Unreliable.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Charmed.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's nice to see the Unreliable again. Useful ship. Hawthorne was my contractor. I'd recognize that leaky boat of his anywhere.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I didn't kill him.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Don't let ADA hear you calling her ship names.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Get to the point, Hagen.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: I didn't ask.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: I have a salvage job for someone light on corporate ties with a reliable set of wings. But there's a catch.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: If you have a Navkey to Stellar Bay, the job's yours. Interested?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I can get into Stellar Bay. Tell me about the job.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's so special about Stellar Bay?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not interested.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: One of my guys in Stellar Bay has a lead on some high-grade salvage, but he went dark before he could spill the goods.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: We arranged a drop at the saltuna warehouse's loading dock. Find whatever he left there and take it to Fallbrook. My gal Catherine will be expecting you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll take the job.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's SubLight doing in Fallbrook?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What kind of salvage are we looking for?

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now get going. Catherine will brief you on the details when you check in with her at Fallbrook.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: One last thing. When you're on the job, keep a pair of eyes on the back of your head. Understood?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Understood.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What am I looking for?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sounds shady.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Anything else I should know about Monarch?

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: You'll do fine. Probably nothing to worry about. Probably.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Don't go looking for anything. Except salvage. Just watch out.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Could be.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Few laws and even fewer people to enforce them. If you're working for the right side, it's a fucking paradise.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: A few of my contractors run flights in there and out again, "working around" the Board embargo.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: We keep the community lubricated with a steady supply of booze and unconventional erotica. Byzantium kids with more money than sense can thank SubLight for their good time.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: We keep the community lubricated with a steady supply of booze and unconventional erotica. Byzantium kids with more money than sense can thank SubLight for their good time.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: How unconventional? Asking for a friend.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Why do you need me if you already have people on the ground?

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: One of my guys filmed a raptidon grinding on an automech. Didn't end well for anyone, including the cameraman.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Catherine is tied up with other matters, and I don't want her bothered. I told her I'd be sending my best fixer. Try and play the part.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: When the Board pulled out of Monarch, they buried or sealed anything they couldn't carry off world.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Apparently, one of Catherine's teams uncovered an abandoned lab with full tanks of Alta-Vitae gas.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: First, an embargo that's been active ever since the Board pulled its forces off world. Few regulations, plenty of freedom. Second, all the goodies that no one had time to pack.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Too bad. You know where to find me when you're ready to pursue a respectable career.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Is ADA still at the helm? I don't know how many times I told Hawthorne to restore that smart ass to factory settings.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: A little advice? Before you start telling lies, get a feel for who you're talking to.
